column4: Hi! -- I'm a network engineer, I'm used to running OS X and using Apple Remote Desktop to view/control all of our network's computers in work. We are moving to ubuntu, and our server to ubuntu-server, what's the best equivalent to use?

Hi! -- I'm a network engineer, I'm used to running OS X and using Apple Remote Desktop to view/control all of our network's computers in work. We are moving to ubuntu, and our server to ubuntu-server, what's the best equivalent to use?
